text:
Lana Del Rey has stepped on the Grammy’s red carpet in a crystal starburst-embellished Gucci gown with short hair bob in which she looked completely stunned.

The singer has made her debut in 2011 with ‘Video Games’, her stylised cinematic voice and songs references have been personified with the usage of makeup. Lana’s retro style, including cat-eye makeup and her American influential hairstyles, a standout on the red carpet with glamour. Like her sound, her signature has remained consistent as well as unique. In the honour of her nomination for Best Pop Album of the Year, this year the singer has appeared on the 2018 Grammys Awards red carpet with her signature look.

She has opted for her classic Hollywood style, like her album ‘Lust for Life’, with her dewy makeup and elongated cat-eye. She has kept her hair simple with centre-half and barely bumped ends. She has topped her beauty with a Gucci halo-inspired crown, crowning herself as the ‘Queen of Retro’ unofficially. The elongated eyeliner with rose-tinted eyeshadow and lipsticks paired with the glamour of the red carpet and it is also classic, bringing a feminine flair to any dress at any event. PRIV makeup artist Jared Lipscomb has given some steps and tips to add this cat-eye to your Valentine’s Day beauty.

Pro tip: Take your liner to the sting of your eyebrow for achieving the star’s Grammys red carpet style.

Step1: Apply a primer to the lids for long-lasting wear.

Smashbox 24 Hour Photo Finish Shadow Primer; $21

Step2: Wash over the eyelid with a nude-to-pink eyeshadow by using a blending brush.

Dior Limited Edition 5-Couleurs Eyeshadows; $63

Step3: If you are facing trouble while drawing even cat-eye, you can use a stamp to outline the pointed tip.

Vampstamp Vavavoom Medium; $25

Step4: Fill in the outlines and connect the outer portion to the inner and top lash line.

Step5: Apply mascara to the top and bottom lash line and then use a few coats to the top for adding drama to the look.

Almay One Coat Mega Volume Mascara; $6.97

Final Look: At last, finish your look with a rose-tinted lipstick

Stila Stay All Day Liquid Lipstick in Patina Shimmer; $22
